The IC⁵⁹ value indicates the concentration which a 50% displacement of the specific binding of H³-flunitrazepam (1.0 nM, 0 ° C) in samples with a total volume of 0.55 ml of a suspension of brain membranes, e.g. caused by rats.
0.5 ml of a suspension of untreated rat forebrain in 25 mM KH₂PO₄, pH = 7.1 (5-10 mg tissue / sample) is for 40 to 60 minutes at 0 ° C together with ³H-diazepam (specific activity 14.4 Ci / mmol, 1.9 nM) or 3 H-flunitrazepam (specific activity 87 Ci / mmol, 1.0 nM).
